channel.title: Evolve... it's a game
channel.description:
For those of you who don't know what it is: It's a game similar to Left 4 Dead (actually from the makers of said game) you can take the role of one of 4 hunters or 1 of several "monsters" that have different abilities.
The hunter's objective is to hunt down the monster and kill it, the monster's objective is to survive until they evolve to level 3 and either do objectives around the maps or attempt to eliminate the hunters.
The more of this game I see, the more I want to play it.
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sdbm9K2CsqU']Monster gameplay footage. (alpha)[/url]
[url='https://evolvegame.com/']Main website for those interested.[/url] Thoughts?

item.title: Evolve... it's a game
item.dc:creator: MSKyuuni
item.description:
I really want it TBH. Apparently they’re putting in singleplayer but we all know it’s just gonna be MP with customisable bots like in CSS and L4D2. I don’t mind, bots are fine with me

tldr turtle rock is rad imo

Read full topic

item.title: Evolve... it's a game
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
For those of you who don’t know what it is: It’s a game similar to Left 4 Dead (actually from the makers of said game) you can take the role of one of 4 hunters or 1 of several “monsters” that have different abilities.

The hunter’s objective is to hunt down the monster and kill it, the monster’s objective is to survive until they evolve to level 3 and either do objectives around the maps or attempt to eliminate the hunters.

The more of this game I see, the more I want to play it.

Monster gameplay footage. (alpha)

Main website for those interested. Thoughts?
